casebody.data:
Martyn BRUNO
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 13, 2017

Vishal K. Garg, in support of the petition.

James A. Killen, senior assistant stale's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Martyn Bruno's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 173 Conn.App. 902, 159 A.3d 1204 (2017), is denied.
